About Us

The Chinese University of Hong Kong, Shenzhen ï¼CUHK-Shenzhenï¼was founded in accordance with the Regulations of the Peopleâs Republic of China on Chinese-foreign Cooperation in Running Schools upon approval by the Ministry of Education. The University is committed to providing top-quality higher education that features an integration of the East and the West and fostering an enriching research environment. It is CUHK-Shenzhenâs mission to cultivate innovative talents with a global perspective, Chinese cultural traditions and social responsibilities.
